Smolder.name: Smolder
Smolder.title: the Fiery Fledgling
Smolder.lore: Hidden amongst the craggy cliffs of the Noxian frontier, under the watchful eyes of his mother, a young dragon is learning what it means to be heir to the Camavoran imperial dragon lineage. Playful and eager to grow up, Smolder looks for any excuse to practice his burgeoning abilities. Though he's still a fledgling, his skills are nothing to sneeze at, easily setting fire to anything that burns.
Smolder.blurb: Hidden amongst the craggy cliffs of the Noxian frontier, under the watchful eyes of his mother, a young dragon is learning what it means to be heir to the Camavoran imperial dragon lineage. Playful and eager to grow up, Smolder looks for any excuse to...
allytips: Smolder has a vulnerable early game. Focus on passive stacking and staying alive to become a strong dragon later!
Smolder relies on his team to keep him safe. Try to find allies who can help you against enemy threats.
Smolder can do a lot of damage to areas of enemies. Look for attack opportunities where the enemies are close together.
enemytips: Smolder relies on his team for safety. Attack him when his team can't save him.
Don't group up when facing Smolder!
Smolder is very vulnerable in the early stages. Try to take advantage of his weakness before he can learn how to be a dragon!
Smolders flight can be interrupted by hard CC and impacted by slows.

spells.name: Super Scorcher Breath
spells.description: Smolder breathes fire on an enemy. As he gains more stacks, this ability becomes more powerful.
spells.tooltip:
Smolder belches flame, dealing {{ tooltipqdamage }} physical damage + {{ passive_damage_increase }} magic damage.

Based on stacks of Dragon Practice, this Ability evolves to gain the following effects:
  • {{ stacktier1 }} Stacks: Damages all enemies surrounding the target.
  • {{ stacktier2 }} Stacks: Sends {{ tier2_numberofblowback }} explosions beyond the target that deal {{ tier2_blowbackpercentagedamage }}% of this Ability's damage.
  • {{ stacktier3 }} Stacks: Burns the target, dealing {{ tier3_truedamagepercent*100 }}% max Health true damage over {{ tier3_dotlength }} seconds. Enemy champions that drop below {{ tier3_executethreshold }} total health while burning are killed instantly.
    • {{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Achooo!
spells.description: Smolder lets out an adorable flaming sneeze that explodes when hitting enemy champions.
spells.tooltip:
Smolder lets out an adorable flaming sneeze, dealing {{ initialdamage }} physical damage and Slowing by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Hitting champions causes an explosion, dealing {{ explosiondamage }} physical damage + {{ passive_damage }} magic damage.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Flap, Flap, Flap
spells.description: Smolder takes flight ignoring terrain and attacking the lowest health enemy.
spells.tooltip:
Smolder takes flight, gaining {{ movespeed*100 }}% Move Speed and ignoring terrain for {{ duration }} seconds.

While flying, Smolder attacks the lowest Health enemy {{ totalnumberofattacks }} times for {{ damageperhit }} physical damage + {{ passive_damage_increase }} magic damage each.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: MMOOOMMMM!
spells.description: Smolder calls his mom to breath fire from above, dealing extra damage and slowing enemies in the center of her fire.
spells.tooltip:
Smolder's mom breathes fire from above, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage. Enemies in the center instead take {{ tooltiponly_totalsweetspotdamage }} and are Slowed by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Smolder's mom heals her son for {{ momhealcalc }} Health if she hits him.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

passive.name: Dragon Practice
passive.description: Hitting champions with Abilities and killing enemies with Super Scorcher Breath grants a stack of Dragon Practice. Stacks increase the damage of Smolders basic Abilities.
